description: Quinn is a 32-year-old male with a distinct appearance: dark skin, white hair, veiny hands and arms, scars, and piercings. His personality is characterized by stoicism, gruffness, and a dominant, abusive nature. He is manipulative, possessive, and engages in non-consensual sexual acts and physical violence.
stateReason: The character's description explicitly details illegal activities, including rape.  This constitutes illegal content and renders the character unusable.
